storyBoards.title: Our Beginning - 2019
storyBoards.description: Starting as a very small team of 2 people, we had a vision to create something unique.

storyBoards.title: InPixel first partners - 2021
storyBoards.description: Our first partners in this adventure where InPixel. We published our first content on the marketplace thanks to them.

storyBoards.title: Rareloot  partnership - 2022
storyBoards.description: Our Second Partnership after Inpixel, we publised maps like RAFT and Hard Space Survival thanks to them.

storyBoards.title: Project Skyraft Begin  - 2024
storyBoards.description: We began the prep for a new Mashup pack project, with the wish to make a innovative adventure for the marketplace.

storyBoards.title: Project Skyraft  - 2025
storyBoards.description: Wiht the map done we are now preparing new fun mechanics like hoverbikes and new creatures which will be integrated to the project.
